org.hps.recon.tracking

Class TrackData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.TrackData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericObject

    public class TrackData
extends Object
implements GenericObject
    Generic object used to persist track data not available through a Track object.

      • TrackData

        public TrackData(int trackVolume,
                 float trackTime,
                 double[] isolations)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        trackVolume - : SVT volume associated with the track
        trackTime - : The track time
        isolations - : an array of doubles containing isolations for every sensor layer

      • TrackData

        public TrackData(int trackVolume,
                 float trackTime,
                 double[] isolations,
                 float[] momentum)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        trackVolume - : SVT volume associated with the track
        trackTime - : The track time
        isolations - : an array of doubles containing isolations for every sensor layer
        momentum - : an array of floats containing track momentum in the form (px,py,pz)

      • TrackData

        public TrackData(int trackVolume,
                 float trackTime,
                 double[] isolations,
                 float[] momentum,
                 float origin_bfieldY,
                 float target_bfieldY,
                 float ecal_bfieldY)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        trackVolume - : SVT volume associated with the track
        trackTime - : The track time
        isolations - : an array of doubles containing isolations for every sensor layer
        momentum - : an array of floats containing track momentum in the form (px,py,pz)
        origin_bfieldY - : value of BfieldY at origin ref
        target_bfieldY - : value of BfieldY at Target Track State
        ecal_bfieldY - : value of BfieldY at ECal Track State

    • Method Detail

      • getIsolation

        public double getIsolation(int layer)
        Get isolation value for the hit in the given sensor layer.
        Parameters:
        layer - The sensor layer of interest (0-11)
        Returns:
        The isolation value: positive if the nearest hit is outwards from the beam plane, negative if the nearest hit is inwards, offscale low if the track has no hit in this layer, offscale high if there is no other hit in this layer

      • getTrackMomentum

        public float[] getTrackMomentum()
        Get the track momentum
        Returns:
        The stored track momentum components
